column1: England began their World Cup journey with a resounding 6-2 victory over Iran. At the half-time whistle
column2: the Three Lions had already established a 3-0 lead
column3: with Bellingham netting his first England goal
column4: followed by Saka and Sterling. Saka scored his second shortly after the hour mark
column5: but Taremi responded with a goal off the underside of the bar. Substitutes Rashford and Grealish then sealed the win
column6: with Rashford scoring just 49 seconds after coming on. The game was completed with a late penalty from Taremi
